content:
Public channel created by Rick Gleason. Description:

Discussion about celestial navigation plugin improvements.

Github: https://github.com/rgleason/celestial_navigation_pi/tree/improve
Cloudsmith Repository (result of the CI build process):
https://cloudsmith.io/~opencpn/repos/celestial-navigation-beta/packages/?q=2.4.43.3+tarball

Have incremented the plugin as v2.4.43.3 and the builds should land in Cloudsmith in the celestial-navigation-beta repository
here https://cloudsmith.io/~opencpn/repos/celestial-navigation-beta/packages/ if you download the appropriate tarball and install it using Options > Plugins > Import Plugin Tarball, you should be able to test it.

Stelian advises that I've made the Issues too complex, and that the next thing to do is moon SD and HP.

We do have a pretty good manual here and I will have to update it after this.

He suggested a rollover for dialog description. If we developed a short list of needed description/explanation for each dialog, perhaps an "Info" rollover that would display the test? - We obviously have some work first, but I would put this into one Issue.

Since we have not tested Lunars to my knowledge, perhaps we should simply state that they are not tested and they have been left as they are.

Then after we clean up and finalize things including documentation and the manual, we should take a break.

I hope to learn study this more and learn how to do lunar. Then maybe next winter we can do that?

Github rgleason/celestial_navigation_pi/improve branch now v2.4.47.0 It is building now.
https://github.com/rgleason/celestial_navigation_pi/tree/improve
The deployed files will be found in Cloudsmith celestial-navigation-beta
https://cloudsmith.io/~opencpn/repos/celestial-navigation-beta/packages/
Adding search (upper right corner) for "2.4.47 tarball"
https://cloudsmith.io/~opencpn/repos/celestial-navigation-beta/packages/?q=2.4.47.0+tarball
There are 16 files, pick your OS and download. Then use Options > PI > Import Plugin Tarball.

https://cloudsmith.io/~opencpn/repos/celestial-navigation-beta/packages/?q=2.4.48+tarball
When dave merges this PR it will be available on Plugin Beta catalogÂ  https://github.com/OpenCPN/plugins/pulls
